taskbody.steps-informal:
A new text tab will load by default, you can type out your code or text and save it with the desired extension.You can create a file in three alternate ways:
Click on the new icon on the main tool bar
Choose the New menu from File drop down menu in the menu bar
Press the Ctrl+N keys
The new file tab will appear. Key in the code or text you want. You can set the text format or the programming language of your choice using the Language menu.
The context sensitive pop-up menus will provide you instant prompts as you key in the code.
